Description: The following switch statement is missing a default case: switch (status)  				{  					case INSiriAuthorizationStatus.Authorized:  						Console.WriteLine("SiriKit Authorized");  						break;  					case INSiriAuthorizationStatus.Denied:  						Console.WriteLine("SiriKit Denied");  						break;  					case INSiriAuthorizationStatus.NotDetermined:  						Console.WriteLine("SiriKit Not Determined");  						break;  					case INSiriAuthorizationStatus.Restricted:  						Console.WriteLine("SiriKit Restricted");  						break;  				}
